This example is 2015 Opel Mokka 1.4 Turbo Cosmo Auto, amazing family vehicle loads of space, perfect to be driven every day or just having fun on the weekends. Loaded with features such as power steering, multi-functioning steering, air conditioning, radio/CD/USB/Bluetooth connectivity, fully function functioning electric windows, central locking remote, front armrest, reverse camera, electric mirrors, roof racks and excellent boot space to put your extra luggage. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.

The word Amaze is suited to this vehicle due to its affordability and comfortable drive. It features Honda's front design with spotlights, which is quite unique and stylish in its own way. At the rear is a roof-mounted sharkfin antenna, and third, high-mounted brake light.
